Articles.Content:
Sorry if this is the wrong discussion area, I haven't been on here for a while;

Does anyone know the instruments (or Sound Fonts) used to make the theme, and ingame music? I've been looking but couldn't find any. All I really want is a .sf2 (Sound Font) of the theme instruments, and space music to try to remake some of the music. Thanks
Most of the in-game music comes from Kevin MacLeod (Incompetech.com). I don't know if he's put out any information about what he uses or not.
Thanks. Also, does anyone know where I could find a space-organ type soundfont?
Look up a sawtooth/square synth, or a synth with reverb.
